subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets, with right tackle Damien Woody new to the line, are eager to take on a Giants squad that piled up 53 sacks last season and will have its sights set on Brett Favre.
snippet: The Jets, with right tackle Damien Woody new to the line, are eager to take on a Giants squad that piled up 53 sacks last season and will have its sights set on Brett Favre.
